headline.main: THE ISTHMUS.; Our Relations with New-Granada--The Panama Massacre.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor fo the New-York Times: MY DFAR SIR: On the 18th July, 1858, MOS B. CORWISE. E-q., appointed United States Special Commissioner to examine into the particulars realtive to the massacle of American citizens at the Panana Railhad station on the 15th of April, 1856, made his report to our government, accompanled by volumimous testimeny.

docs.snippet: EXHIBITION OF THE PUBLIC SCHOOLS AT COOPER INSTITUTE,--From the opening of the School Exhibition, on the 22d Inst., until its close on Saturday, the rooms of the Cooper Institute have been daily visited by large numbers of persons who take an...
docs.lead_paragraph: EXHIBITION OF THE PUBLIC SCHOOLS AT COOPER INSTITUTE,--From the opening of the School Exhibition, on the 22d Inst., until its close on Saturday, the rooms of the Cooper Institute have been daily visited by large numbers of persons who take an interest in education, and the efforts of the teachers of the Public Schools to respond to this first attempt to set forth the evidences of progress among their pupils, have met with many encomiums.

docs.snippet: The United States Mail Steamship Illinois, Captain F. McGOWN, from Aspinwall, at 10 1/2 o'clock, A. M., of Nov, 20, arrived last night, bringing the treasure and passengers from San Francisco by the Sonora.

headline.main: FROM THE PACIFIC.; Arrival of the Illinois, and the Mails by the Tehuantepec Route. $1,816,532 in Treasure. SEVERE GALE AT ASPINWALL. LATEST ADVICES FROM FRASER RIVER.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail Steamship Illinois, Captain F. McGOWN, from Aspinwall, at 10 1/2 o'clock, A. M., of Nov, 20, arrived last night, bringing the treasure and passengers from San Francisco by the Sonora.

headline.main: FOUR DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE; Cotton Firm-Breadstuffs Dull-Provisions Lower-Consols 98 1-8. LATER FROM INDIA. Arrival of the North Briton at Portland. Marine Disasters on the English Coast. Speech of the King of Portugal on the Affair of the Charles et Georges.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Canadian Steamship Company's screw steamer North Briton, Captain THOMAS JONES, from Liverpool at 4:15 P. M., on Wednesday, the 17th inst., arrived here at 3 o'clock this morning. The North Briton has made the passage in ten days and a half. Her advices are four days later than those by the Africa at New-York.

docs.snippet: We learn that there is reason to believe that, instead of having committed suicide as was at first reported, Mr. E. J. DICKENS; whose sudden death at Jersey City has been already noticed, was accidentally poisoned.
docs.lead_paragraph: We learn that there is reason to believe that, instead of having committed suicide as was at first reported, Mr. E. J. DICKENS; whose sudden death at Jersey City has been already noticed, was accidentally poisoned.

docs.snippet: The Panama Railroad Company's steamship Columbus arrived here on the 4th. Her dates are from Guatemala to the 25th, from Salvador to the 27th, Nicaragua to the 29th, and Costa Rica to the 31st October.

headline.main: Our Correspondence by the Illinois..; General Summary of News. CENTRAL AMERICA.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Panama Railroad Company's steamship Columbus arrived here on the 4th. Her dates are from Guatemala to the 25th, from Salvador to the 27th, Nicaragua to the 29th, and Costa Rica to the 31st October.

docs.snippet: The second election under the new Charter of New-York will take place on the first Tuesday in December, (one week from tomorrow,) and we have compiled from authentic sources a list of the various candidates already in the field. A few more...

headline.main: CHARTER ELECTION.; WHO ARE TO BE OUR CITY RULERS. Candidates for the Common Council and School Officers. WHO THEY ARE AND WHAT THEY ARE.

docs.lead_paragraph: The second election under the new Charter of New-York will take place on the first Tuesday in December, (one week from tomorrow,) and we have compiled from authentic sources a list of the various candidates already in the field. A few more nominations for minor offices have yet to be made, but the Municipal candidates are now before the people, and our list, as far as it goes, will be found complete and accurate.
